pr_title: Issue #11985: Add EJB 4.0-RC1 feature and project

timeline.bodyText:
suggested edit:
This feature enables support for Jakarta Enterprise Beans that are written to the Enterprise Beans Lite subset of the Jakarta Enterprise Beans 4.0 specification.
timeline.author: dmuelle

+description=This feature enables support for Jakarta Enterprise Beans written to the Enterprise Beans Lite subset of the Jakarta Enterprise Beans 4.0 specification.

timeline.message:
Issue #11985: Add EJB 4.0-RC1 feature and project

Add projects and features required to include the EJB 4.0-RC1 API
JAR in the builds. At least one public feature is required, so
added ejbLite-4.0, which won't work just yet, but will allow
other components to include the EJB API dependency as needed.

Issue #11985: Add EJB 4.0-RC1 feature and project

Add projects and features required to include the EJB 4.0-RC1 API
JAR in the builds. At least one public feature is required, so
added ejbLite-4.0, which won't work just yet, but will allow
other components to include the EJB API dependency as needed.
